page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The area provides little employment beyond a variety of farming, thus its commuter population moves out daily to Glasgow, Barrhead, Paisley and Kilmarnock and places further afield. The commuters include professionals such as accountants, architects, civil servants, quantity surveyors, brokers, lawyers, bankers and insurance agents. From education there are primary and secondary teachers, college and university lecturers and professors of conveyancing and physics. Medically we have doctors, dentists, nurses, a pharmacist and a vet. The retail trade provides meat and vegetable wholesalers, newsagents, car dealers, whisky salesmen and drapers. We have manufacturers of leather, thread and furniture. We have oilrig workers and artists.
